    • playCharacterCard

      public void playCharacterCard(CardEffect cardEffect, String nickname, int idS, int idI, int idSE, SColor colorChosen)
      Plays the Character Card selected
      Parameters:
      cardEffect - the effect selected
      nickname - the player that plays the card
      idS - id of the student
      idI - id of the island
      idSE - id student from the entry
      colorChosen - if the effect selected needs a color
